tasks.title: Measure 1 - Freeze the situation
tasks.description:
### ğŸ¯ Objective
**Cut off** attacker's command & control and **stabilize** the host.
### ğŸ“Œ Actions
- Interrupt the activity of the infected machine

  - If VM: **pause**; if physical: **extended sleep** if possible
  - As last resort: controlled shutdown (if isolation impossible) **after** rapid collection if available (including memory)
- Network-level isolation of infected zones from the rest of the information system
  - **Network isolation** via EDR or equipment (L2/L3/WAF/Proxy); cut flows **in both directions**
  - Isolate particularly sensitive zones if the infected machine was accessing them
### âœ… Deliverables
+ Frozen state + isolated perimeter
+ Log in the **activities** of this task the actions performed.
